headline.main: BAZAAR IS OPENED BY LADY HALIFAX; Three-Day Event Will Benefit Victoria Home or Aged Britons In Ossining

lead_paragraph: Lady Halifax, wife of the British Ambassador to the United States, opened Ye Olde English Faire, the twenty-first annual bazaar sponsored by the Daughters of the British Empire in the State of New York, at the Hotel Biltmore yesterday afternoon.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: AGED BRIT MEN AND WOMEN, VICTORIA HOME FOR
